Overview Reference requestModel echo

API / Reference

echo

Perform basic input validation and return the supplied parameters as the result. This method therefore suitable for testing and API availability checking purposes.

Parameters

Any JSON object.

Result

Same as parameters.

Examples

Request

POST https://api.archilogic.com/v1 HTTP/1.1
Host: api.archilogic.com
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "echo",
  "params" : {
    "any": 1,
    "thing": true,
    "here": "there"
  },
  "id" : "abcd12345"
}

Response

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result" : {
    "any": 1,
    "thing": true,
    "here": "there"
  },
  "id" : "abcd12345"
}
